mapper.sql: id, code, client_code, client_id, order_id orderId, order_code orderCode, car_no carNo, driver, driver_phone driverPhone, dport, destination, rport, consignee, ddate, cr_date crDate, op, goods_name goodsName, weigh, case_model caseModel, case_no caseNo, seal_no sealNo, address, contact, arrival_time arrivalTime, attention, sign_time signTime, start_port startPort, end_port endPort, memo, flag,case_weight,car_weight,net_weight,total_weight
mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_delivery d left join t_order o on d.order_id=o.id left join t_client c on d.client_id=c.id
d.code like concat('%',#{delivery.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or d.client_code like concat('%',#{delivery.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or o.code like concat('%',#{delivery.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or c.cname like concat('%',#{delivery.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select d.id, d.code, d.client_code, d.client_id, d.order_id, d.order_code, d.car_no, d.driver, d.driver_phone, d.dport, d.destination, d.rport, d.consignee, d.ddate, d.cr_date, d.op, d.goods_name, d.weigh, d.case_model, d.case_no, d.seal_no, d.address, d.contact, d.arrival_time, d.attention, d.sign_time, d.start_port, d.end_port, d.memo, d.flag,d.case_weight,d.car_weight,d.net_weight,d.total_weight, c.cname from t_delivery d left join t_order o on d.order_id=o.id left join t_client c on d.client_id=c.id
d.code like concat('%',#{delivery.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or d.client_code like concat('%',#{delivery.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or o.code like concat('%',#{delivery.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or c.cname like concat('%',#{delivery.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by d.ddate
limit #{page.start},#{page.end}

select DATE_FORMAT(d.ddate,'%Y年%m月%d日') ddate,c.cname,u.uname,d.memo,d.`code`,d.case_model,d.dport,d.destination,d.rport,d.case_no,d.seal_no,d.car_no,f.fee from t_delivery d INNER JOIN t_client c on d.client_id=c.id INNER JOIN t_user u on d.op=u.id INNER JOIN (select bill_id,group_concat(CONCAT_WS('：',IFNULL(fname,'未知'),cast(amount as CHAR)) separator '\n') income,group_concat(CONCAT_WS('：',IFNULL(fname,'未知'),cast(pay as CHAR)) separator '\n') pay from t_fee where ftype=2 group by bill_id) f on d.id=f.bill_id where d.ddate BETWEEN #{sdate} and #{edate} order by d.ddate
mapper.delete: delete from t_delivery where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and flag=0
mapper.insert: insert into t_delivery (id, code, client_code, client_id, order_id, order_code, car_no, driver, driver_phone, dport, destination, rport, consignee, ddate, cr_date, op, goods_name, weigh, case_model, case_no, seal_no, address, contact, arrival_time, attention, sign_time, start_port, end_port, memo, flag,case_weight,car_weight,net_weight,total_weight ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{op,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{caseWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{carWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{totalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )

mapper.update:
update t_delivery
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_code = #{clientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_phone = #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dport = #{dport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rport = #{rport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ddate = #{ddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cr_date = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
op = #{op,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weigh = #{weigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_model = #{caseModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_no = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seal_no = #{sealNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arrival_time = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
attention = #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_time = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_port = #{startPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_port = #{endPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
case_weight=#{caseWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
car_weight=#{carWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
net_weight=#{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
total_weight=#{totalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_delivery set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_code = #{clientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_phone = #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dport = #{dport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rport = #{rport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ddate = #{ddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, op = #{op,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weigh = #{weigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_model = #{caseModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_no = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_no = #{sealNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrival_time = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attention = #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_time = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_port = #{startPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_port = #{endPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_weight=#{caseWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, car_weight=#{carWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, net_weight=#{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_weight=#{totalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and flag=0
